Miles Sound System SDK 6.6h

AIL_stream_volume_levels

The function AIL_stream_volume_levels returns the current stream volume s, from 0 to 1.0.

void AIL_stream_volume_levels(
  HSTREAM S,
  F32 *left_level,
  F32 *right_level
);

In Parameters

S
indicates the stream whose volume is to be retrieved.

Out Parameters

left_level
returns the left speaker volume level from 0 (minimum) to 1.0 (maximum).
right_level
returns the right speaker volume level from 0 (minimum) to 1.0 (maximum).

Discussion

See AIL_set_stream_volume_levels for more information.


Group: Digital Audio Streaming Services
Related Functions: AIL_set_stream_volume_levels, AIL_stream_low_pass_cut_off, AIL_stream_reverb_levels
Related Basic Types: F32, HSTREAM, void
Related FAQs: I used an older version of Miles and now my volume and pan calls are weird - what's going on? And what's with the two types of volume functions?
